relation: Great for these types of students
Great for those who don't know where to go from high school.
Get good grades and transfer quick.
You save a lot of money because the government pays for your classes and with your FASFA all you need to buy are your books. Put the money aside for when you transfer is the best advice I can give.

Although I would have rather been at a University like I had initially planned I like the schools atmosphere. They welcome you into the school and it is easy to get around. Not to mention all the money I'm saving.

As a first time college student at ELAC I found out first hand how hard it is to add classes. Although it is hard the teachers there are great and they have many programs to help you transfer in 2 years.
pageTitle: East Los Angeles College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {352698=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 274375=I haven't yet attended the school since I start at the end of August but I can see there is a bunch of entertainment not only on the campus but around the area. I've already fallen in love with a local restaurant designed for college students. It has a variety of Chinese food and has a bunch of fun games like air hockey, table tennis. A bunch of arcade games, and more fun stuff. However on campus there ialways events from the many clubs on campus like the drama club who are always whipping up lovely plays., 291309=The campus will have a cafeteria in 2016 and now the students can all enjoy the various food locations around campus, the lunch truck, and food from the Husky Store., 172318=Home of the 1984 Olympics., 324451=In november there is Aztec dancers that perform in ELAC. Also they have the Aztlan 5k run and the 3k walk., 324741=jogging in the neigborhood, visit the vincent museum. participate in the Aztlan run or walk in August.}

textAfterTable: Categories Comments Tips for prospective students look at all your options to get help, there are many out there. In three sentences elac goes out of their way to help students succeed. it is extremely diverse. Login to rate or flag the reviews Susana from South Gate, CA 03/09/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 2 people found this review useful. 3 of 87 Categories Comments Campus Safety the campus safety is not that great. the cadets are only there for their own interest. they are usually flirting and not doing their job. Greek Life no greek life for this is a community college. Clubs and Activities there are many clubs around the campus and the best part is that its very easy to start your own club.
